titles.title: An Act to name the Department of Veterans Affairs community-based outpatient clinic in Statesboro, Georgia, the Ray Hendrix Department of Veterans Affairs Clinic.
To name the Department of Veterans Affairs community-based outpatient clinic in Statesboro, Georgia, the "Ray Hendrix Veterans Clinic".
An Act to name the Department of Veterans Affairs community-based outpatient clinic in Statesboro, Georgia, the Ray Hendrix Department of Veterans Affairs Clinic.

action.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Health.
Referred to the House Committee on Veterans' Affairs.
Mr. Dunn moved to suspend the rules and pass the bill.
Considered under suspension of the rules.
DEBATE - The House proceeded with forty minutes of debate on H.R. 3946.

vote.text: On motion to suspend the rules and pass the bill Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.
Received in the Senate and Read twice and referred to the Committee on Veterans' Affairs.
Senate Committee on Veterans' Affairs discharged by Unanimous Consent.
Measure laid before Senate by unanimous consent.

vote.text: Passed Senate with an amendment and an amendment to the Title by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Message on Senate action sent to the House.
Mr. Roe (TN) asked unanimous consent to take from the Speaker's Table and agree to the Senate amendments.

vote.text: On motion that the House agree to the Senate amendments Agreed to without objection.

reference.label: text as House agreed to Senate Amendment

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary: (Sec. 1) This bill designates the Department of Veterans Affairs community-based outpatient clinic in Statesboro, Georgia, as the "Ray Hendrix Department of Veterans Affairs Clinic" or the "Ray Hendrix VA Clinic."
